comment: Dr. Stevenson is passionate and leads a great lecture. If taking art history at KSU, Dr. Stevenson is a wise choice. Attendance is checked and every class is a lecture so it makes sense to show up. She makes the lectures interesting, and enjoyed her class.
it's sad that these people didn't even know her name is spelled "stephenson." check under that name for more ratings.

Not worth your tuition dollars. this is more about how to talk like an art snob than anything doing with art appreciation. Classes are dry and straight out of the book. the only reason to attend daily is the occasional group work she has you do.

Dr. Stevenson is a nice lady from South Africa. She has a very strong accent. The class is so large that it is difficult for her to get to know her students personally, so this class is very formal. In order to do well, you need to go to class, get the notes, and have a thorough understanding of the material.
